title: Your weather update for Wednesday (27)
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Department of Meteorology announced that showers or thundershowers will occur in the Western, Central, Sabaragamuwa, Southern, and Uva provinces and Kurunegala district during the afternoon or night.
The general public is kindly requested to take adequate precautions to minimize damages caused by temporary localized strong winds and lightning during thundershowers.
Ali Sabry sworn in as Justice Minister, will function as Finance Minister as well
